root.name: MicroLink Push Your Luck
root.description: Push Your Luck consists of five rounds where two dice are rolled to determine the "blockers". The player then decides whether to push or stop for a certain round. Each time a blocked number appears, that die is eliminated for the rest of that player's round. Points are earned on each roll for the face amounts of non-blocked dice. If you run out of dice, your score for that round drops to 0.
